name: Always Green
description:
Always Green, is the simplest, most exciting and most challenging game. You just have to be attentive and be quick with your fingers. 

You only have to meet a goal...you must always, always touch the green key, respond quickly to changes, if you touch the wrong one, the game is over, if you are very slow the game is over.
Do you think you are up to the challenge?

Features: 
♦ List of positions
♦ Unlock achievements
♦ Fast game rhythm
♦ Optimized for high resolution devices
